column4: New install question. The partition manager has something called "EFI boot partition", however I was sure that the last time I installed ubuntu I just went for ext4 mounted on /boot - what am I missing here? Is EFI actually what I typically mount in /boot, or is it something else entirely?
So what is this EFI good for?
IDK.  I've got it by I installed ubuntu with ext4 anyway.  Pretty sure efi is related to boot partition/configuration.
